page.title: 15The motorway
page.content: The motorway, opened in 1973 has considerably reduced the flow of traffic through Tetsworth. A 30 minute count the afternoon produced the following figures:- Village Motorway cars 24 cars 552 lorries 2 lorries 282 vans 6 vans 162 coaches 1 coaches 24 motor bikes 1 motor bikes 6 bicycles 1 bicycles 0 The older residents can remember when the A40 - or Old London Road - was very busy and dangerous. The motorway may have reduced the volume of traffic through the village, but those who do use it often ignore the 30 m.p.h. limit and speed through without consideration to the safety of pedestrians and other road users.
